text:
@perlmutations @Pantomime521 Worldometer says US COVID-19 cases now 2.14M and deaths now 117k.
Despite Trump's denial, COVID-19 is *not* contained in the US and is very much out of control.
His reckless, self-serving decisions keep making the pandemic worse.
#RemoveTrump #VoteBlue2020
